Html: It would be greatly beneficial, in the methods that I use this tool (to create BiS gearings, to be able to select all the items listed as available.  This could (brainstorming here) be done by haing a toggle to "select all as available", or a toggle to invert the items noted as available.  To preserve the item list for normal use, the former seems better, though quite a bit more troublesome to implement.

This has been asked for many time (search the forums) and the answer is still No. You do not want to do that, and we don't want to let you do that.

To find the BIS gearset, just mark the top few items in each slot, optimize, then run Build Upgrade List, mark anything that's an upgrade as available too, optimize again.
Awesome.  That's what I've been doing.  Thanks!
